general.name: Adam Cheong
general.headline: Rock Climber & Roboticist
general.summary: Inventive high school student in San Francisco with a passion for science, engineering, math and finance; natural born athlete who loves to climb rocks, surf waves, ski downhill, and run cross-country; electric guitar aficionado.

experience.name: Watney Robotics, San Francisco, California
experience.summary: Assemble and test robot controllers that allow humans from halfway around the world to teleoperate robot arms with low latency and training robot arms to perform precise tasks reliably.

volunteer.summary: Supervising students and gain first hand experience through teaching small groups of students a new skill.
highlights: CPR, AED & Basic First Aid Certified

projects.name: Monte Carlo Simulation of Somatic Twist in Ancient Marine Worms
projects.summary: Run Monte Carlo simulation to recreate evolutionary events inside a computer; and see how the first digital C. elegans worm evolves in silico to become the ‘first fish’ — with a dorsoventrally inverted body plan after a somatic twist.

projects.name: The Cliffhanger Project
projects.summary: A novel mountain climbing aid that brings a new mechanical advantage to mountaineers by means of a simple lever mechanism — inspired by a physics demo harnessing a setup of three toothpicks to carry a payload hanging off the edge of a table.
